mapper.select: SELECT column_name AS field_name, column_comment AS field_comment, data_type AS field_type, ordinal_position AS order_num FROM information_schema.COLUMNS WHERE table_name = #{tableName} ORDER BY ordinal_position

SELECT column_name AS field_name, column_comment AS field_comment, data_type AS field_type, ordinal_position AS order_num FROM information_schema.COLUMNS WHERE table_name = #{tableName} AND column_name LIKE CONCAT('%', 'temp', '%') ORDER BY ordinal_position

SELECT date_format( create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i' ) AS timeline
${field}
FROM ${tableName}
EXTRACT(MINUTE from create_time) % 30 = 0
AND date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') >= date_format(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
AND date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') <= date_format(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
ORDER BY timeline
